review: This thing is a great product. No issues yet.While it's perfect for things like Netflix and Hulu, it is the perfect place for use of the Plex app. If you have tons of Movie and TV files on your computer or a hard drive and you want to stream it to your TV, use Plex through this thing and it will do all the work for you. It automatically loads metadata from outside sources and gives you Episode Names, Descriptions, and any other info for all your shows and movies.This stick opens you up to several different ways of streaming your favorite media and it works like a charm.
